DIOAN is contraindicated in patients who are hypersensitive to any component of this product.

sentences.en: He is hypersensitive to any kind of criticism.
sentences.cn: 他对任何一种批评都过敏.

sentences.en: Hypersensitive reaction and callose formation were two important resistance mechanisms.

sentences.en: I am hypersensitive to Est é e Lauder.

sentences.en: Student teachers were hypersensitive to any criticism of their performance.

sentences.en: This explanation was readily understood by Melanie who was hypersensitive about all matters relating to childbirth.

trans.tran_en: if someone is hypersensitive to a drug, substance etc, their body reacts very badly to it
